generic.note: Updated how vision sharing functions with non player controlled units
generic.info: Affects the Mars facet "Blood Sport" and the Night Stalker facet "Blinding Void"

generic.note: Dire/Radiant buildings and creeps can now be affected by vision sharing. While their individual vision is unlinked, they do not provide any shared vision
Rules for how player controlled units share vision is unchanged
Observer and Sentry Wards always use the team's vision regardless of the status of who placed them
Other controlled units use the vision status of the player's hero
Forced Movement is any effect that forcibly moves a unit
Knockback is a subset of Forced Movement and applies to any effect that pushes or pulls a unit a fixed distance over a short period of time
Does not apply to constant applications of movement speed
Does not apply to effects that move units to a fixed point
The following abilities are considered Knockback
Keeper of the Light's Blinding Light
Puck's Waning Rift with Jostling Rift
